name: Love Shadow Nightmare [DEMO]
description:
Jam notes:  The character sprites were commissioned pre-jam. The monster sprite is original to this jam. This is a demo. 

Mysterious sinkholes are opening up all over Lunaria's neighborhood. What could be the cause?

This is an otome game. It has cute boys. Except it's also a horror* game. Play at your own risk!

It is also a demo for a longer game. Right now, it functions as a kinetic novel. You can play one entire route of about 20,000, without choices. 

*The horror is monstrous, existential and sometimes personal. There's no sexual assault or anything like that. I just want to get that out there. Sorry for the spoilers.
